distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for cpio fixes the following issues:

- Fixed cpio not extracting correctly when using --no-absolute-filenames option the security fix for CVE-2023-7207 (bsc#1218571, bsc#1219238)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Debian's cpio contains a path traversal vulnerability. This issue was introduced by reverting CVE-2015-1197 patches which had caused a regression in --no-absolute-filenames. Upstream has since provided a proper fix to --no-absolute-filenames.
notes.title: CVE description
